name: Fall Dice (CyberLab Studios)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Hello Everyone!

We are CyberLab Studios, longtime gamejam aficionados!

this time we present to you Fall Dice!

A simple racing (or better, RAGING) game about a cutesy little dice named "Dadino", try to guide him to the finish line without falling if you can!

We had very little time, but we wanted to partecipate in this jam anyway, the game is a little bit wonky and difficult, sorry in advance!

CONTROLS

- W D  - Side Movement

-  S  - Brake

GAMEPLAY NOTES

The dice keep rolling forward, you can brake and turn

Take the boost powerups to accelerate!

Try and do the best time, post your times in the comments!

CREDITS

- Andrea Di Bartolo > 3D Art - VFX - Game Design

- Samuele Padalino > Code - UI - Game Design

- Music and Sound effects are from www.zapsplat.com
